metadata.title: CVE-2024-4768 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A bug in popup notifications' interaction with WebAuthn made it easier foran attacker to trick a user into granting permissions. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 126, Firefox ESR < 115.11, and Thunderbird < 115.11.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
